Articles.Content: make a craft that can use lift to bounce off the atmosphere. No just aero brake, but use the lift to go back up, maybe not back to space but to reduce entry time. Kinda like the Apollo retry.  Mods allowed but have to be published.
Hmm... Just about any spaceplane can do that... How do you want people to prove they did the challenge?

Oh, hah! I've got a Kerbal with some atmospheric bounce.

 

Pew! Magta bounces off Laythe's atmosphere at 20km/s, using lift to change her heading by 45 degrees and increase her speed by 4-fold (non-physical). She doesn't survive it for very long, though! The video starts in the middle, but you can start at the beginning if you'd like to see the setup- it's no cheats just minor glitches. I suspect you might have had ships and survival in mind, though? Mostly posted because I thought it was a funny entry.
